summary: Simple mod that allows player to control Dawnguard Eclipse.
descriptionHtml:
Hello guys!

At first I have to sorry for any language mistakes I made in description ;)

[b][i][color=#ff0000]Mod requires the latest version of Skyrim and Dawnguard of course.
[/color][/i][/b][color=#ff0000]For now it doesn't require to have DG finished. I'll change it one day!Â [/color]

Ok, so after trying a few mods that should give player power to toggle the Eclipse I was quite angry when none of them worked properly. After that I made my own that finally does what it had to - allow player end the Thyrany of the Sun or bring sun back whenever he wants to.

For now mod just adds a spellbook with a lesser power near the Harkon's coffin. Use the power during the sunny (or cloudy, lol) day and you'll have a beautiful Eclipse. Use it when Eclipse is on the sky and it'll end it. Mod offers Eclipse with all its visual effects, removing sun weaknesses and making vampire attacks - in mechanic it works exactly as Auriel's Bow.

I'll improve my mod by adding some lore-friendly stuff like quest or something (and better description ^^) if I see people are interested in this mod. So any feedback or reported bugs would be nice.

So, hope you enjoy it and let the darkness rule the world! ;]

P.S.
You can cast it in interiors and everything will be ok. I am not sure how it will work when cast between 7 PM and 6 AM.
author: Gestru
